comments.body: [~jloza], I assume we need a linked UX ticket?

Yes, and this implementation ticket should not be in sprint 2, please. We need a blocking UX ticket and this can't be started until that's done. Please concentrate sprint 2 on CW stuff, and if you need other stuff, multi-select on landing pages.

Hi [~dkavanagh], one tiny thing:

The stack name in the breadcrumbs is not a link, but should be.
Hi [~dkavanagh], landing page won't load anymore. Screenshot attached. Ideas?
UX review passed, ready for code review! Yay!

Had to close PR 1822 due to the errant commit in the GUI-2360 branch.

Replaced with https://github.com/eucalyptus/eucaconsole/pull/1832 (created GUI-2360-good branch, cut from last know good commit on GUI-2360 branch)

/cc [~dkavanagh], [~tvo]
[~jloza]: No, there isn't but there is now (DOC-1806). Thanks for pointing this out!
[~dkavanagh]: Punting back to address concerns noted in PR comments
Punting back to fix GET request snafu.  From the HTTP 1.1 spec, a GET request should be safe (i.e. not modify state) and idempotent.  See https://www.w3.org/Protocols/rfc2616/rfc2616-sec9.html#sec9.3
We covered this in 4.2 with Create Stack Wizard. I left links in the PR for the text added to the UI for this.
